BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_SCH_TRN (NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,STR_AUDIT_YEAR,STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,NUM_DEPT_CODE,DT_AUDTING_FROM_DATE,DT_AUDTING_TO_DATE,STR_ADMIN_ORDER_NO,DT_ADMIN_ORDER_DATE,STR_REMARKS,STR_AUDIT_STATUS,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_MODIFY_SL_NO) ( SELECT T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO,T.STR_AUDIT_YEAR,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE,T.DT_AUDTING_FROM_DATE,T.DT_AUDTING_TO_DATE,T.STR_ADMIN_ORDER_NO,T.DT_ADMIN_ORDER_DATE,T.STR_REMARKS,T.STR_AUDIT_STATUS,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, (select nvl(max(A.STR_MODIFY_SL_NO),0)+1 from ACTIA_LOG_AUDIT_SCH_TRN A where A.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE ) FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_SCH_TRN T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

UPDATE ACTIA_AUDIT_SCH_TRN T SET T.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,T.DT_AUDTING_FROM_DATE=?,T.DT_AUDTING_TO_DATE=?,T.STR_ADMIN_ORDER_NO=?,T.DT_ADMIN_ORDER_DATE=?,T.STR_REMARKS=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_SCH_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
